S04n393:1: athe sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat-atidurlabhaṃ bhagavan asyāvalokiteśvarasya vikurvitāni śrūyante guṇodbhāvanāni ca |
S04n393:2: bhagavānāha-api ca kulaputra tasmād vajrakukṣeryadā niṣkrāntaḥ,
S04n393:6: tadapi samatikramya viśvabhūrnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n393:7: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūt girigahvarāntarakarvaṭasthānavāsī,
S04n393:9: tadā kālānukālaṃ mayā tasya viśvabhuvaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā vividhasarvasattvaparipācanam |
S04n393:10: asti sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin sā kāñcanamayī nāma bhūmirasti yaduttarasyāṃ kāñcanamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ gatvā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'dhomukhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
S04n393:12: sa tataḥ kāñcanamayyā bhūmyā niṣkramitvā rūpyamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati |
S04n393:13: tatra sa paśyati catuṣpādikāni sattvāni puruṣapudgalāni |
S04n393:14: dṛṣṭvā teṣāmavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāmeva dharmaṃ deśayati-śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sarve puruṣapudgalā abhimukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pracalamānasucetasā nirvāṇikam |
S04n393:16: athe te sarve puruṣā avalokiteśvarasya purataḥ sthitvā etadavocat- āśvāsaya tvam |
S04n393:19: aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mātāpitṛbhūto bhava |
S04n393:22: sukhitāste sattvā ye tava satataṃ parigrahaṃ nāmamanusmaranti,
S04n393:24: idaṃ ca samāgāḍhataraṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācitpratyanubhavanti,
S04n393:25: muñcanti te hīdṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ yāvadyādṛśaṃ vayaṃ pratyanubhavāmaḥ ||
S04n393:26: atha sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nama mahāyanasūtraratnarājaṃ karṇapuṭe niścārayati sma |
S04n393:27: te ca sattvā amuṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anyonyavihitaśrotṛkarṇapuṭā niścaranti sma |
S04n393:28: tadapi te puruṣāḥ śrutvā avaivartikabhūminiṣpāditāḥ paramasukhasamarpitāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ ||
S04n393:29: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyā rūpamayyā niṣkramyānyatarāyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati sattvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitahṛdayo'yomayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ yatra sa rājā balirasurendro baddhaḥ |
S04n393:31: upasaṃkramya ca rājño balerasurendrasya dūrataścakṣurdarśanaṃ yāti sma suvarṇabimbamiva raśmibhiḥ pramuñcamānairnānāvarṇaiḥ ||
